mapper.update:
update bas_device_config
roomId = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bedId = #{bedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceModel = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interfaceType = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ipAddress = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netPort = #{netPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serialPort = #{serialPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baudRate = #{baudRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_device_config set roomId = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bedId = #{bedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deviceModel = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interfaceType = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netPort = #{netPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serialPort = #{serialPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baudRate = #{baudRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_device_config set roomId = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bedId = #{bedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deviceModel = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interfaceType = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netPort = #{netPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serialPort = #{serialPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baudRate = #{baudRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bedid = #{bedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from bas_device_config a where beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from bas_device_config a WHERE a.enable = '1' and beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT bas_sys_code.codeValue FROM bas_sys_code WHERE bas_sys_code.groupId = 'serial_port' and beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND not EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM bas_device_config WHERE interfaceType = 2 and bas_device_config.enable = '1' and bas_device_config.serialPort = bas_sys_code.codeValue and bas_device_config.beid = bas_sys_code.beid and bas_device_config.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
